definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: They offer score systems or membership systems to consolidate the consumption group.
sentences.chinese: 积分制，会员制不断出台稳定消费群。

sentences.english: He is a club member in good standing.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个遵守会章的俱乐部会员。

sentences.english: Letter of authorization by member to settlement personnel.
sentences.chinese: 会员对清算人员的授权书。

sentences.english: Some bad-tempered members shouted at the chairman during the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 一些坏脾气的会员在会议期间向主席叫喊。

sentences.english: Smaller companies are working on subscription and fee models as well.
sentences.chinese: 较小的公司也开始采用收取会员费和使用费的模式。

sentences.english: This club consists of more than 200 members.
sentences.chinese: 这个俱乐部由200位以上的会员所组成。

sentences.english: One free draft beer for purchasing draft beer at Lunch time in De Bistro .
sentences.chinese: 会员在西餐厅享用午餐时，买扎啤可免费赠送一杯。

sentences.english: May I have your card number?
sentences.chinese: 我可以知道您的会员卡号吗？

sentences.english: ASC entrusts its sub-institutes and local chapters to assist for admitting members and practises dependency administration.
sentences.chinese: 本会委托地方学会协助发展会员，并实行属地管理。

sentences.english: Members of a Community of Practice are practitioners.
sentences.chinese: 一个实践社区的会员就是实践者。

sentences.english: Each boy has a basketball member card.
sentences.chinese: 每一个男孩都有一张篮球会员证。

sentences.english: Every member of the club was prest.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的每个会员都出席了。

sentences.english: 1976 elected fellow , the society of designer - craftsmen.
sentences.chinese: 1976年，当选为设计师，手工艺者学会会员。

sentences.english: Normally incorrect blame member opens these meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 这些会所通常不对非会员开放。

sentences.english: All information and data contained in this Website is complied only for the members of On Fook Church for reference.
sentences.chinese: 本网站所载的资料祗供安福堂及其会员参考。

definition: to join a society, association etc
specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
abbr. for 中國文學藝術界聯合會|中国文学艺术界联合会, China Federation of Literary and Art Circles (CFLAC)
